info.title: Boomplay Rest API
info.description:
This is documentation for boomplay REST API

- For information about flow, visit [BoomPlay_flow](https://excalidraw.com/%C3%82%C2%A0%C3%AB%C2%9D%C2%BC%C3%AB%C2%8A%C2%94%C3%AA%C2%B2%C2%8C#json=feQ5K88tvJa7R40UufSaN,y3R-7LsdmSCE4EfmL5L4UQ).
- Check out our [Docs](https://justdoju.notion.site/BoomPlay-docs-d209fb5dade24e7f926772c067aaa020?pvs=4).

post.description: Creates a new user on boomplay

requestBody.description: If send empty value, data will be removed

patch.description: After smart contract call, transaction hash update to our db
Admin can update the role of a member

wallet_address.description: The wallet address of the member

role.description: The new role for the member

patch.description: Admin can archive a member by their wallet address. Requires admin authentication.

wallet_address.description: The wallet address of the member to be archived

patch.description: Admin can unarchive a previously archived member by their wallet address. Requires admin authentication.

wallet_address.description: The wallet address of the member to be unarchived

patch.description: Admin can lock a member by their wallet address. This involves a smart contract call and a database update. Requires admin authentication.

202.description: Transaction success but DB Update Failed

wallet_address.description: The wallet address of the member to be locked

patch.description: Admin can unlock a member by their wallet address. This involves a smart contract call and a database update. Requires admin authentication.

202.description: Transaction success but DB Update Failed

wallet_address.description: The wallet address of the member to be unlocked

patch.summary: Set the Draft result for a quest
patch.description: Sets the draft result for a specified quest and updates its status

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to set the draft result for

value.message: Transaction success but DB Update Failed

patch.summary: Make the Draft result for a quest
patch.description: Creates the draft result for a specified quest, updates its status, and interacts with the smart contract

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to make the draft result for

value.message: Transaction success but DB Update Failed

patch.description: Only use this api when quest is not satisfy first step in dao process

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to finish

patch.description: Publishes an approved quest to the blockchain and updates its status

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to publish

value.message: Transaction success but DB Update Failed

patch.description: Finishes a quest by calling the smart contract and updates its status in the database

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to finish

value.message: Transaction success but DB Update Failed

patch.summary: Start DAO success decision process for a quest
patch.description: Initiates the DAO success decision process for a quest by calling the smart contract and updates the quest status in the database

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to start DAO success decision for

value.message: Transaction success but DB Update Failed

patch.summary: Set DAO success decision for a quest
patch.description: Sets the DAO success decision for a quest by calling the smart contract and updates the quest status in the database

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to set DAO success decision for

value.message: Transaction success but DB Update Failed

patch.summary: Make DAO success decision for a quest
patch.description: Initiates the process to make a DAO success decision for a quest

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to make DAO success decision for

value.message: Transaction success but DB Update Failed

patch.description: Adjourns a quest, potentially pausing or delaying its current state

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to adjourn

value.message: Transaction success but DB Update Failed

patch.summary: Set DAO answer for a quest
patch.description: Sets the DAO answer for a specified quest

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to set DAO answer for

value.message: Transaction success but DB Update Failed

patch.description: Updates the status of a quest to mark it as successful

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to mark as successful

value.message: Transaction success but DB Update Failed

patch.summary: Set Draft End time in force (ONLY TEST)
patch.description: This api is only for the test

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to mark as successful

patch.summary: Set Success End time in force (ONLY TEST)
patch.description: This api is only for the test

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to mark as successful

patch.summary: Set Answer End time in force (ONLY TEST)
patch.description: This api is only for the test

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to mark as successful

post.summary: Create a new vote for a quest
post.description: Creates a new vote for a specific quest

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to vote on

patch.description: After smart contract call update success option & tx

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to vote on

patch.description: After smart contract call update answer option & tx

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to vote on

patch.description: After smart contract call update reward status as true. it means the voter got reward

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to vote on

patch.description: When member want to get rid of the vote from the list, archive it

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to vote on

get.description: Get vote data from voter & quest_key

parameters.name: quest_key
parameters.description: The key of the quest to vote on

post.summary: Create a new season for a quest
post.description: Creates a new season for the project

get.summary: Get details of the active season
get.description: Retrieves the details of the currently active season

description.example: Exciting quests for summer 2023

get.summary: Get details of a specific season
get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific season by its ID

parameters.name: season_id
parameters.description: ID of the season to retrieve

description.example: Exciting quests for summer 2023

patch.description: Updates an existing season with the provided data. All fields are optional.

parameters.name: season_id
parameters.description: ID of the season to update

start_date.description: Updated start date of the season

end_date.description: Updated end date of the season

min_pay.description: Updated minimum payment for the season

max_pay.description: Updated maximum payment for the season

service_fee.description: Updated service fee for the season

charity_fee.description: Updated charity fee for the season

creator_fee.description: Updated creator fee for the season

patch.summary: Toggle active status of a season
patch.description: Toggles the active status of a specific season. If it was active, it becomes inactive and vice versa.

parameters.name: season_id
parameters.description: ID of the season to update

patch.description: If admin want to hide season from public

parameters.name: season_id
parameters.description: ID of the season to update

patch.description: If admin want to show the hide season in public

parameters.name: season_id
parameters.description: ID of the season to update

post.summary: Create a new category for quests
post.description: Creates a new category for quests in the project

get.description: Retrieves a list of all quest categories

createdAt.description: Creation date and time of the category

archivedAt.description: Archival date and time of the category, if archived

patch.description: Updates the details of a specific quest category

parameters.name: quest_category_id
parameters.description: ID of the category to update

patch.description: Archives a specific quest category. This operation marks the category as archived, typically hiding it from active use.

parameters.name: quest_category_id
parameters.description: ID of the category to archive

patch.description: unArchives a specific quest category.

parameters.name: quest_category_id
parameters.description: ID of the category to archive

description.example: Unique identifier for the member
Ethereum wallet address of the member
Role of the member
Email address of the member
Name of the member
URL of the member's avatar image
Email verification status
Timestamp when the member was locked
Transaction hash of the locking transaction
Transaction hash of the delegation transaction
Timestamp when the member was created
Timestamp when the member was last updated
Timestamp when the member was archived
Unique identifier for the vote
The key of the associated quest
The address of the voter
The voting power of the voter
The option chosen in the draft vote
The transaction hash of the draft vote
The option chosen in the success vote
The transaction hash of the success vote
The key of the associated quest answer
The transaction hash of the answer vote
The reward status of the vote
The date and time when the vote was archived
Key of the associated quest
Title of the quest
Description of the quest
Unique identifier of the season to which this quest is related to
Unique identifier of the category to which this quest is related to
The creator of the quest (address)
The image url of the quest
External link of the quest
The end date of the quest
The end date of the quest in utc
True if associated quest is hot, false otherwise
The status of the quest
Transaction hash of publish tx
The date and time when the quest is published
The transaction hash of the finish tx
The date and time when the quest is finished
The transaction hash of the adjourn tx
The date and time when the quest is adjourned
Transaction hash of the adjourn tx
The date and time when the quest is set to success
The date and time when the quest is created
The date and time when the quest is updated
The date and time when the quest is archived
Transaction hash of the dao created tx
The start date of the dao draft vote
The end date of the dao draft vote
Transaction hash of quest draft tx
The start date of dao success votes
The end date of dao success votes
Transaction hash of dao success tx
The start date of dao answer votes
The end date of dao answer votes
Transaction hash of dao answer tx
